songs.title: 2Crazy
songs.lyrics:
Shit Crazy

[Hook: K Camp]
2 Crazy, man that bitch act 2 crazy
Every time we fuck it's 2 crazy
Man my life is 2 crazy (shit 2 crazy)
2 crazy, everybody think I'm 2 crazy (2)
Smoking on dank that's 2 crazy (2)
Spill my drink I'm 2 crazy (2)
2 crazy, 2 crazy, 2 crazy, 2 crazy, 2 crazy (yeah)
You know a young nigga  2 crazy
2 crazy, 2 crazy, 2 crazy, 2 crazy, 2 crazy (2 crazy)
You know a young nigga  2 crazy

[Verse 1 : K Camp]
I get money for a hobby, bad bitches all in the lobby
If you lil niggas gon' copy, make sure you do that shit properly
Young nigga stanking that broccoli, bad hoes wanna stand beside me
I fucked her friend she'll probably, Snapchat that pussy no Gotti
Man my bitch act 2 crazy , shawty double trouble like two babies
You ain't getting money you 2 lazy, shawty broke and mad that's 2 phases
I got that money on me like I'm supposed 2
Young nigga made 6 figures I'm pro 2
You ain't wanna let me in so I had to show you
When I got problems who the fuck can I go to?

[Hook: K Camp]
Man this shit is 2 crazy, man that bitch act 2 crazy
Every time we fuck it's 2 crazy
Man my life is 2 crazy (shit 2 crazy)
2 crazy, everybody think I'm 2 crazy (2)
Smoking on dank that's 2 crazy (2)
Spill my drink I'm 2 crazy (2)
2 crazy, 2 crazy, 2 crazy, 2 crazy, 2 crazy (yeah)
You know a young nigga 2 crazy (2 crazy)
2 crazy, 2 crazy, 2 crazy, 2 crazy, 2 crazy (2 crazy)
You know a young nigga  2 crazy

[Verse 2 : K Camp]
Can't stop a nigga on a mission, got my bitch whipping in the kitchen
Shawty that pussy finger licking, and I ain't even get a chance to stick it
Nigga we do this for a living, bitch better watch for the pimping
Hooked on the money I'm fishing, hooked on the money I'm fishing
Shawty wanna ride like SoMo, joint got the boy on slow-mo
Shawty last nigga is a bozo
You can catch me getting money in some shell toes
You can catch me getting money in some flip flops
Told lil shawty make sure the door locked
Brand new so I had to let the fro lock, shawty licking on a nigga like a blow pop

[Hook: K Camp]
And I swear to God it's 2 crazy
Man that bitch act 2 crazy
Every time we fuck it's 2 crazy
Man my life is 2 crazy (shit 2 crazy)
2 crazy, everybody think I'm 2 crazy (2)
Smoking on dank that's 2 crazy (2)
Spill my drink I'm 2 crazy (2)
2 crazy, 2 crazy, 2 crazy, 2 crazy, 2 crazy (yeah)
You know a young nigga 2 crazy (2 crazy)
2 crazy, 2 crazy, 2 crazy, 2 crazy, 2 crazy (2 crazy)
You know a young nigga 2 crazy

Yeah (2 crazy)
Yeah (2 crazy)
Yeah (2 crazy)
Yeah (yeah)
Yeah
Slumped (slumped)
Yeah (2 crazy)
Yeah (2 crazy)
Yeah, yeah, (woo) yeah
Trap
Slumped
Turn up hoe
